items.description: A tag/keyword that this module relates to.

license.description: License name. Or an array of license names.

minimum-stability.description: The minimum stability the modules must have to be install-able. Possible values are: dev, alpha, beta, RC, stable.

require.description: This is a hash of module name (keys) and version constraints (values) that are required to run this module.

type.description: Module type, either 'library' for common modules,or a custom type ([a-z0-9-]+) defined by whatever project this module applies to.
